00074 //
00075 // Window types
00076 //
00077 // There are KVI_WINDOW_NUM_TYPES predefined
00078 // window types: these are used by the KVIrc core and distributed modules
00079 // If you add a new def, increase KVI_WINDOW_NUM_TYPES
00080 //
00081

00376 #ifndef _KVI_WINDOW_CPP_
00377         // The active window:
00378         //   This is almost always non null
00379         //   The exception is the startup (when there are no windows at all)
00380         //   and the last phase of the destructor.
00381         //   You usually shouldn't care of checking this pointer for NULL unless
00382         //   you're running very early at startup or very late at shutdown
00383         extern KVIRC_API KviWindow * g_pActiveWindow;
00384 #endif
00385 
00386 inline QByteArray KviWindow::encodeText(const QString &szText)
00387 {
00388         if(m_pTextCodec) {
00389                 return m_pTextCodec->fromUnicode(szText);
00390         } else {
00391                 return defaultTextCodec()->fromUnicode(szText);
00392         }
00393 }
00394 
00395 inline QString KviWindow::decodeText(const char * szText)
00396 {
00397         if(m_pTextCodec) {
00398                 return m_pTextCodec->toUnicode(szText);
00399         } else {
00400                 return defaultTextCodec()->toUnicode(szText);
00401         }
00402 }
00403 
00404 #endif //_KVI_WINDOW_H_
